attributes.action: Ban the NHS from providing cosmetic procedures and instead make their sole priority improving and saving the lives of sick people
attributes.additional_details:
The aim of this e-petition is to gather enough signatures for Parliament to reform their policies on cosmetic procedures and instead make their sole priority saving and improving the lives of sick people.

Many of us are disgusted at the media reports we are seeing of people being given breast enlargements and nose jobs on the NHS while sick people are refused life-saving or life-improving drugs and surgery.

If you believe in a healthcare system that works by saving lives, sign this petition.

You never know, you or somebody you love could be refused life-saving or life-improving treatment if changes are not made.

rejection.details: Please see: Stop Expensive Vanity Operations on the NHS
